message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $12000. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $15000. This is an opportunity to acquire a piece that could potentially be a valuable asset in your collection or business. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.
